thread.content: Tell me your experiences - good or bad. Fid
thread.author: BOB FIDDAMAN

thread.content: First two months have been ok, third month has been really awful: Weird dreams, exhausted, dizziness, nausea, headaches and brain zaps, food cravings (specifically high carb and chocolate), very irritable and angry, depressive episodes, sometimes I get the sweats, get very edgy when somewhere else (I.e not at home). Praying for it all to end. Horrible experience.
thread.author: Chickenjungle
